code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{setTheme}from'./themeSlice';export var useSwitcher=function useSwitcher(){var theme=useSelector(function(state){return state.theme;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var toggleTheme=function toggleTheme(){dispatch(setTheme(theme==='light'?'dark':'light'));};useEffect(function(){document.body.setAttribute('data-theme',theme);},[theme]);return[theme,toggleTheme];};
